item.title: Faster Software Development with the Mikado Method
item.description: As a software engineer, have you ever faced a complex project where every task seems to depend on another? My team at HashiCorp ran into just that — and found a method that helped us tackle those interdependencies in a way that lets us make smooth progress. Here’s how the Mikado Method improved our workflow. The Challenge Link to heading About a year ago, my team at HashiCorp tried something new.
